snippet: When problems happen with India’s electrical system, there is very little to fall back on.
abstract: Region of India affected by the nation's massive blackout is effectively a single, interconnected electricity grid, which means that power is transmitted through it almost instantaneously, as are imbalances.
lead_paragraph: When problems happen with India’s electrical system, there is very little to fall back on.

headline.seo: India’s Power Grid Lacks Excess Capacity
headline.main: An Electrical Grid Is Pressed to Its Limit
headline.print_headline: An Electrical Grid Is Pressed to Its Limit
